strengthen.translation[0].definitions[0]: to become stronger or make something stronger
Our friendship has steadily strengthened over the years.
Steve’s opposition only strengthened her resolve to go ahead.
The company plans to strengthen its hand  (=make itself more powerful) in Europe by opening an office in Spain.
The university hopes to strengthen its ties with the local community.
strengthen.translation[0].definitions[1]: to make an organization, army etc more powerful, especially by increasing the number or quality of the people in it
The team has been strengthened by the arrival of two new players.
strengthen.translation[0].definitions[2]: if the financial situation of a country or company strengthens or is strengthened, it improves or is made to improve
strengthen.translation[0].definitions[3]: to increase in value, or to increase the value of money
The pound has strengthened against other currencies.
strengthen.translation[0].definitions[4]: to make something such as your body or a building stronger
Metal supports were added to strengthen the outer walls.
strengthen.translation[0].definitions[5]: Fresh evidence has greatly strengthened the case against him.
strengthen.translation[0].definitions[6]: The wind had strengthened during the night.
strengthen.translation[0].note_box[0].se: They have strengthened their position by their performance in the recent local elections.
The controversy has strengthened the hand of her critics.
Other people's doubts only strengthened my resolve to start my own business.
He wants to strengthen ties with the West.
Having counselling is a very positive step which could strengthen your relationship.
A presidential decree strengthened the role of the Security Council.
strengthen.translation[1].definitions[0]: if a currency strengthens, or something strengthens it, the currency increases in value
The Singapore dollar has gradually strengthened against the pound and the US dollar.
The G7 industrial nations might act later this month to strengthen the yen.
strengthen.translation[1].definitions[1]: to improve the financial situation of a country, company etc
These measures are designed to strengthen the company’s market position.
